def consecutive(arr):
    return max(arr) - min(arr) + 1 - len(arr) if arr else 0

def consecutive(arr):
    #your code here
    if len(arr) == 1 or len(arr) == 0:
        return 0
    mn, mx = min(arr), max(arr)
    s = set(arr)
    return mx - mn - len(s) + 1

def consecutive(arr):
    return len(range(min(arr),max(arr)+1))-len(arr) if arr else 0
